messages.subject: note from Mary/Zenmomma (indirectly)
messages.msgSnippet: Mary/Zenmomma wanted me to tell people she s having an e-mail problem which will be fixed soon, but if you get what seems to be a response to the list only it
messages.messageBody:
Mary/Zenmomma wanted me to tell people she's having an e-mail problem which
will be fixed soon, but if you get what seems to be a response to the list
only it comes to you privately, if you want to, cut and paste it into an
e-mail to the list.

Forwarding it won't work.

And if it's minor don't worry about it, but if it's really glorious
information as some of hers is, send it!! I don't want to miss any.

Now that I've announced it, it probably won't happen anymore. <g>

Sandra
